description: Schema for validating the visual style configuration for a tenant

invertedNavbarColors.description: Does the navbar have inverted colors (light text on a dark background)?

navbarBackgroundColor.description: The background color of a navigation item that's not active (not being visited)

navbarActiveItemBackgroundColor.description: The background color of a navigation item that is currently active (being visited)

navbarActiveItemBorderColor.description: The border color of a navigation item that is currently active (being visited)

navbarTextColor.description: The color of the text used for all text in the navbar

navbarHighlightedItemBackgroundColor.description: The background color of a navigation item in the navbar that needs to attract extra attention (e.g. the sign-up button)

navbarBorderColor.description: The color of the full-width bottom border of the navbar

signedOutHeaderOverlayColor.description: The overlay color of the signed-out header

signedOutHeaderTitleFontSize.description: The font size of the title of the signed-out header (in pixels)

signedOutHeaderTitleFontWeight.description: The font weight of the title of the signed-out header (200, 300, 400, 500, 600 or 800)

signedOutHeaderOverlayOpacity.description: The opacity of the overlay of the signed-out header (0 (no color) to 100 (full color))

signedInHeaderOverlayColor.description: The color of the overlay of the signed-in header

signedInHeaderOverlayOpacity.description: The opacity of the overlay of the signed-in header (0 (no color) to 100 (full color))

customFontName.description: The name of the configured custom font for the platform

customFontAdobeId.description: The Adobe Fonts ID of the configured custom font

projectNavbarBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the project page navbar (shown underneath the main navbar)

projectNavbarTextColor.description: The text color, icon color and bottom border of the project page navbar items (shown underneath the main navbar)

projectNavbarIdeaButtonBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the project navbar 'Post an idea' button

projectNavbarIdeaButtonTextColor.description: The text color of the project navbar 'Post an idea' button
